name: Scarry
description:
SCARRY Description Even cars have dreams while sleeping.

Don’t you know? But, sometimes, their soul remains trapped in a obscure and strange nightmare..

You need to find and eat 5 magic cookies to escape the nightmare!  But, be fast! Something evil is waiting in the darkness..

INCOMPATIBLE GENRES =

RACING GAME + SURVIVAL HORROR SLENDER-LIKE
